name: Orgasm Academy 💦
description:
Welcome to Orgasm Academy💦, an exhilarating adult only visual novel that transforms your studies into the most thrilling game of your life!

Brace yourself for a dive into the academy's world, where girls set the rules. As a boy, it's essential to play your part flawlessly if you aim to inherit your parents' fortune. Don a skirt, conceal your true self, and unveil all the secrets hidden behind the wallpaper of this feminine realm.

Conquer academic heights, sustain intrigue, make the right decisions, and combat blackmail in this uproarious adventure that will be etched in your memory. Immerse yourself further in your education, meet charming characters, and unravel the mysteries of this captivating female world. Prepare for numerous amusing situations, humorous moments, and unforeseen twists of fate.

Orgasm Academy💦 is a unique realm where each day unfolds a new adventure!

Features:
  • A fascinating story
  • A large variety of animated scenes for the different poses and positions!
  • Fast-paced and intuitive gameplay
  • Real-time 3D character and animations
  • Dialogue options that let you decide your personality
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
